name: Arroxa
description:
CLICK TO START

This game is made for GMTK Game Jam 2021 by Ibai Aizpurua (code, graphics, sounds and music!)

Gather pink creatures to fight against yellow evil forces from your comodity of your tabletop.

"Arroxa" is an action stop motion game made with real pictures.

This game is made with Construct 3.
